short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read Paul Graham's essays with fashion. Keep track of the essays you've aleady read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes Paul Graham's website (paulgraham.com) design. The essays are beautiful and easier to read. Accessibility is improved. You can also keep track of the essays you've already read.
